ygData.authorName: Reece Tom CPT25 ID L G4(n)
ygData.subject: Who is John Kim(tm) ? (was Video (WAY OT) )
ygData.msgSnippet: John Kim (tm) was the one of the prominent posters on this list since its creation.  He conducted numerous tests on all of the songs.  Much of the song data on
ygData.messageBody:
John Kim (tm) was the one of the prominent posters on this list since its
creation. He conducted numerous tests on all of the songs. Much of the
song data on Rokenn's song analysis was provided by John. He stopped
posting on this list for whatever reason a couple months ago. John was also
the bard who ran extensive tests on the Lullaby song several months ago and
posted his test results on the Whineplay forum (Kitasi ran similar tests and
included his results in the same thread). After countless bumps, Abashi
finally acknowledged the post and stated Verant would look into the
situation. That was before Kunark was released IIRC. Has been several
months and several patches but still no fix to the song.

Galtin of E'ci

I've noticed that a few people seem to have lamented the 'loss' of John Kim
from the list. Having never read any of the fellow's posts, I can only
presume that he was a prolific tester?

From what I've seen over the past year, Rokenn has done an outstanding job
of testing and retesting with each new patch the various effects of our
songs. Just wanted to say that your efforts are greatly appreciated and
it's people like you that make this list what it is.

Time consuming and job threatening! ;) (j/k)

(feel free to change the topic when replying)




Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
